document.body:
This is the Jaxen navigator for dom4j 1.x. The current version is 2.0.0. This release requires Java 1.5 or later. If you're still using Java 1.4, try Jaxen 1.2.0. If you're still using Java 1.3 or earlier, try Jaxen 1.1.6.
The navigator's Maven group ID is jaxen and its artifact ID is dom4j-navigator. To add a dependency to use Jaxen with dom4j, add these dependency elements to your pom.xml:
<dependency> <groupId>jaxen</groupId> <artifactId>jaxen</artifactId> <version>2.0.0</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>jaxen</groupId> <artifactId>dom4j-navigator</artifactId> <version>2.0.0</version> </dependency>
To add a dependency using Gradle:
dependencies { compile 'jaxen:jaxen:2.0.0' compile 'jaxen:dom4j-navigator:2.0.0' }
